com.facebook.buck.json

Class ProjectBuildFileParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.json.ProjectBuildFileParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ProjectBuildFileParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Delegates to buck.py for parsing of buck build files. Constructed on demand for the parsing phase and must be closed afterward to free up resources.

    • Constructor Summary

      • initIfNeeded

        public void initIfNeeded()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Initialization on demand moves around the performance impact of creating the Python interpreter to when parsing actually begins. This makes it easier to attribute this time to the actual parse phase.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
